hero.title: Discover the world with
hero.subtitle: A personalized travel app that adapts to your lifestyle. From gamers to explorers and seniors - everyone has their adventure.

about.title: Why choose
about.subtitle: The first travel app that adapts to your personality and experience. No more searching through hundreds of options - get exactly what you need for the perfect adventure.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Our algorithm analyzes your preferences and recommends the most suitable travel experience.

personalization.title: Complete Personalization
personalization.description: 4 distinct paths: Gamer, Explorer Advanced, Explorer Beginner and Senior-Friendly.

destinations.title: Unique Destinations
destinations.description: From hidden gems for explorers to popular destinations for beginners.

planning.title: Quick Planning
planning.description: Plan trips in minutes with our advanced AI and personalized recommendations.

safety.title: Safe Travel
safety.description: We verify all destinations and partners for your safety and comfort.

premium.title: Premium Experiences
premium.description: Exclusive access to premium travel experiences and special offers.

cta.title: Ready to start your adventure?
cta.subtitle: Join the community of over 10,000 travelers who have already discovered the world with Trajecta.

features.title: Personalized Paths of
features.subtitle: Each user receives a unique experience, perfectly adapted to their personality and experience. Choose the path that suits you best.

gamer.title: Gamer Path
gamer.description: Dark theme interface with gaming elements, challenges, achievements and leaderboards for a gamified experience.

explorerAdvanced.title: Explorer Advanced
explorerAdvanced.description: Advanced planning tools, multiple filters and off-the-beaten-path destinations for experienced adventurers.

explorerBeginner.title: Explorer Beginner
explorerBeginner.description: Clean interface with step-by-step guidance and popular and safe destinations for travel beginners.

seniorFriendly.title: Senior-Friendly
seniorFriendly.description: Simplified design with large fonts, large buttons and 24/7 phone support for senior users.

testimonials.title: What our
testimonials.subtitle: Each usage path has its community of satisfied users who have discovered unique and personalized travel experiences.
testimonials.statsSubtitle: Numbers that demonstrate the quality of our services
testimonials.ctaMessage: Want to be our next satisfied user?

gamer.comment: Perfect for me! The gaming interface and achievements motivate me to explore more destinations. The coolest gamification system!

explorerAdvanced.comment: The advanced planning tools are incredible. I discovered places I would never have found. The perfect app for adventurers!

explorerBeginner.comment: As a travel beginner, the app guided me perfectly. Now I plan all my vacations myself! Very easy to use.

seniorFriendly.comment: Finally an app I can use without stress. The large buttons and phone support are excellent. I highly recommend!

invalidCredentials.title: Login error
invalidCredentials.description: Incorrect email/phone/username or password. Check your data and try again.

serverError.title: Login error
serverError.description: Could not connect to server. Check your internet connection and try again.

validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.ageInvalid: Age must be between 13 and 120 years
validation.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

success.title: Registration successful!
success.description: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in with your credentials.

invalidData.title: Registration error
invalidData.description: The entered data is invalid or the user already exists. Check the information and try again.

serverError.title: Registration error
serverError.description: Could not connect to server. Check your internet connection and try again.

quiz.title: Discover Your Perfect Path
quiz.subtitle: Answer a few questions to find the ideal travel experience for you
quiz.hint: Choose the answer that describes you best

pathRecommendation.subtitle: Based on your answers, we found the perfect path for you
pathRecommendation.featuresTitle: What you'll find in this path:
pathRecommendation.note: Don't like the choice? You can change the path anytime from settings!
